slider.caption: I think we are in right time, now in India to invest in luxury. It's like investing in New York or London in the 70's.
India is the next China next USA next Europe Undoubtedly

services.title: Sales
services.contentExcerpt: Avec has an inventory of a wide range of handpicked properties.

services.title: Lettings
services.contentExcerpt: Avec provides full-on letting services of exclusive properties on behalf of private individuals, landlords, investors, family trusts, developers, companies and corporations...

services.title: Developments
services.contentExcerpt: Avec has a dedicated team of leasing and marketing experts having unique experience of new project marketing, feasibility study, strategic sales planning etc.

services.title: Property
services.contentExcerpt: Avec offers unparalleled asset management services coverIng all areas necessary for maintaining the integrity of all your properties.

aboutContent: With over 100 years of collective experience of finding luxury homes for the discerning clientele, Avec specialises in exclusive residential homes in India and abroad. Trusted unreservedly by everyone we work with, from private individuals a. landlords to investors, family trusts and developers
